p: The transcripts Î”-1-pyrroline-5-carboxylate synthase ( Urochondra_DN34937_c1_g1_i6), Betaine aldehyde dehydrogenase ( Urochondra_DN24005_c0_g1_i1) and Trehalose 6-phosphate phosphatase ( Urochondra_DN43873_c0_g1_i1) were found to be up regulated indicating accumulation of proline, glycine betaine and trehalose with increasing salt concentration.
